# Alhaji Idris Alhassan Yusuf Tawari

Tawari with His Excellency, Atiku Abubakar]]
Alhaji Idris Alhassan Yusuf Tawari is the Agá»¥ma (a title of the traditional ruler of the Bassa people) of Tawari Chiefdom, Koton Karfe Local Government Council of Kogi State, Nigeria.
He is a second class traditional ruler , .
